Body:
"""
    test_process_dir()

    This function tests that process_dir works correctly on the files in
    example_documents.

    We do this by checking incidences of 'the', 'The' and the combined total
    when the case sensitivity is selected.
    """
_, dicts, top_dict, c_dict, top_c = process_dir(docs_path, extension='txt',
    N=10, case_sensitive=True)
assert top_c['the'] == 43920
assert top_c['and'] == 28094
assert c_dict['The'] + c_dict['the'] + c_dict['THE'] == 46584
